member.name: IIsoImageManager.Validate
member.summary: Determines if the provided .iso image is valid.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

| Return code | Description | |-------------|-------------| | IMAPI_E_IMAGEMANAGER_IMAGE_NOT_ALIGNED | The image is not aligned on a 2kb sector boundary. | | IMAPI_E_IMAGEMANAGER_NO_VALID_VD_FOUND | The image does not contain a valid volume descriptor. | | IMAPI_E_IMAGEMANAGER_NO_IMAGE | The image has not been set using the or method prior to calling this method. | | IMAPI_E_IMAGEMANAGER_IMAGE_TOO_BIG | The provided image is too large to be validated as the size exceeds MAXLONG. |

member.name: IIsoImageManager
